info.title: Cisco Mozart - Grading Engine
info.description: The Open API documentation for the Grading Engine API

requestBody.description: The command used to create a new session

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the session to get

post.summary: Adds a new part to an existing session

requestBody.description: The command that describes the command to execute

delete.summary: Removes a part from an existing session

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the session to remove the part from

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description: The id of the part to remove

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the session the part to grade belongs to

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description: The id of the session part to grade

parameters.name: recollect
parameters.description: A boolean indicating whether or not to force the recollection of outputs

post.summary: Grades the specified session part section item

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the session the item to grade belongs to

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description: The id of the session part the item to grade belongs to

parameters.name: sectionIndex
parameters.description: The index of the section the item to grade belongs to

parameters.name: itemIndex
parameters.description: The index of the item to grade

parameters.name: recollect
parameters.description: A boolean indicating whether or not to force the recollection of outputs

post.summary: Submits the score of the specified session part

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the session the part to submit the score of belongs to

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description: The id of the part to submit the score of

post.summary: Assign a pod to the specified session part

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the session the part to assign the pod to belongs to

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description: The id of the part to assign the pod to

put.summary: Updates the specified session part's pod

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the session the part to update the pod of belongs to

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description: The id of the part to update the pod of

delete.summary: Unassigns the specified session part's pod

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the session the part to unassign the pod from belongs to

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description: The id of the part to unassign the pod from

get.summary: Displays the score report for the specified session

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The id of the session to display the score report for

get.summary: Downloads the ruleset used to grade and score the specified session part

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description: The id of the session part to download the ruleset of

post.summary: Requests the application to synchronize the toolkit used to grade the specified session part

requestBody.description: The command that describes the operation to execute

get.summary: Displays the grading guide for the specified session part

parameters.name: partId
parameters.description: The id of the part to display the grading guide for

put.summary: Sets the scoring requirements of a specific session part's ruleset

requestBody.description: The command that describes the operation to execute

sessionId.description: Gets/sets the id of the session to add a new part to

AddPartToSessionCommand.description: Represents the command used to add a new part to an existing session

id.description: Gets/sets the id, if any, of the session to create. If not set, a new id will be generated.

candidateId.description: Gets/sets the id of the candidate the session to create belongs to

parts.description: Gets/sets a list containing the parts the session is made out of

CreateSessionCommand.description: Represents the Neuroglia.Mediation.ICommand used to create a new Cisco.Mozart.Microservices.GradingEngine.Data.Models.Session

id.description: Gets/sets the id of the session part to create. Typically is the qualified name of the form the part to create is related to

CreateSessionPartCommand.description: Represents the command used to create a new session part

partId.description: Gets the id of the session part to synchronize the grading ruleset of

SetScoringRequirementsCommand.description: Represents the command used to update a session part's scoring requirements

partId.description: Gets the id of the session part to synchronize the grading ruleset of

SynchronizeGradingToolkitCommand.description: Represents the command used to synchronize the grading ruleset of the specified session part

scopes.api: Grants access to the Grading Engine API
